title: "How artificial intelligence can become game-changer in world of diagnostics"
excerpt: "The mean time to the diagnosis of mild Alzheimer’s disease, as per the study, was 7.59 years. Deployment of AI could mean a quantum leap for diagnostics—promising developments have already been reported for breast cancer, kidney disease and even Covid-19."
